name: EntityParse
description: This entity helps us to give the necessary information to the to method, so that it can convert a JSON key into an entity

attributes.name: fieldName
attributes.description: Name of the field to be searched and serialized

attributes.name: convertFieldName
attributes.description: This will be the dress name of the serialized field

attributes.name: dao
attributes.description: This is the DAO object that to search for the object to be serialized in the field

attributes.name: idType
attributes.description: This is the type of id that will be used for the search, either a UUID or a conventional numeric ID
